db:abstract.db:para: Provides a button type that is typically used within a ToolBar.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: ToolButton is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: ToolButton is functionally similar to Button, but can provide a look that is more suitable within a ToolBar.
You can create a custom appearance for a ToolButton by assigning a ButtonStyle.

db:section.db:title: action : Action
db:section.db:para: This property holds the associated button action.
If a button has an action associated, the action defines the button's properties like checked, text, tooltip etc.
When an action is set, it's still possible to override the text, tooltip, iconSource, and iconName properties.
The default value is null.

db:section.db:title: activeFocusOnPress : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies whether the button should gain active focus when pressed.
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: checkable : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is checkable.
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: checked : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is checked.
Only checkable buttons can be checked.
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: exclusiveGroup : ExclusiveGroup
db:section.db:para: This property holds the ExclusiveGroup that the button belongs to.
The default value is null.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] hovered : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the control is being hovered.

db:section.db:title: iconName : string
db:section.db:para: The image label source as theme name. When an icon from the platform icon theme is found, this takes precedence over iconSource.

db:section.db:title: iconSource : url
db:section.db:para: This property holds the icon shown on the button. If the button has no icon, the iconSource property will be an empty string.
The default value is the empty string.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] pressed : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is being pressed.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:member.db:link: Qt Quick Controls Styles QML Types

db:section.db:title: text : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the text shown on the button. If the button has no text, the text property will be an empty string.
The default value is the empty string.

db:section.db:title: tooltip : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the button tooltip.

db:section.db:title: clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the button is clicked.
